# n6py

[![PyPI Latest Release](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/n6py?color=%23141414&style=for-the-badge)](https://pypi.org/project/n6py)
[![PyPI Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/n6py?color=%23141414&style=for-the-badge)](https://pypi.org/project/n6py)

> ‚ö° AI Power Tools

Python Power Tools for Scientific Computing, Machine Learning and Deep Learning.

[Read the Docs to Learn More](https://py.n6.ai).

## Features

- üêç Python - Utility library for AI Python projects.
- üìÉ Jupyter Notebooks - Designed for use inside Jupyter Notebooks but also works in regular .py files.
- ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud - Notebook Cloud Environment compatible e.g. Google Colab.
- üë∂ Simple - Dive right in by adding n6py package to your project via pip.
- üì¶ Modular - Pick and choose which modules to import to suit your needs.
- üé≤ Framework Agnostic - Use n6py with many common frameworks - NumPy, Pandas, etc ...

## Installation

```sh
pip install n6py
```

## Import

```py
import n6py as n6
```
